info.name: float precision → iTime, etc
info.description:
low to high bits of fract() of iTime (top) and iDate.w (bottom).
Just a reminder that IEEE float mantissa only has 23 bits.
Meaning lowest bits of open scale values - like iTime and iDate - can be lost ( and fract/mod won't save the day ;-) )
Evening is w
